title: Richmont Mines posts 2Q profit
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 6, 2015, 15:09 BST - UK Markets close in 1 hr 21 mins Richmont Mines posts 2Q profit Richmont Mines posts second-quarter profit of $2.4 million Associated Press – 5 minutes ago 3.45 +0.15 
ROUYN NORANDA, Quebec (AP) _ Richmont Mines Inc. (RIC) on Thursday reported second-quarter earnings of $2.4 million. 
On a per-share basis, the Rouyn Noranda, Quebec-based company said it had profit of 4 cents. 
The gold mining company posted revenue of $33 million in the period. 
The company's shares closed at $2.60. A year ago, they were trading at $1.69. 

This story was generated by Automated Insights (http://automatedinsights.com/ap) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on RIC at http://www.zacks.com/ap/RIC
